title: cafter
author: cafter
content: Hello,I mostly watch others channel outside from india, is want to know is there any good indian youtube channel to learn about cryptocurrency, there are too many channels but many of them are sharing low quality content, and someone crypto king keyur named channel is really getting worse now a days, i watched his videos 2years ago when i was new to crypto, and now he do too much overacting i get angry on him, don't get serious about that just a thought.please tell if there is a good channel.

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.body: i don't watch any crypto related channels, indian or otherwise.and i don't see any reason to really.just read the news everyday and you'll be fine.most so called "experts" on youtube are there to shill their shitcoins anyway.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Hello & Welcome to the Indian local board. I do follow a YouTube channel for better understanding of different projects in the crypto space as here the changes are pretty fast and it is not easy to keep up with everything happening around.The channels name is Bitinning and the owner of this channel is Kashif Raza. Previously he owned a YouTube channel names Crypto kanoon. It sems he has sold it and started this new channel.

comments.author: bitcoinblog
comments.body: Projects ko Judge karna ek bahut mushkil kaam hai aur youtube Channel se agar proper guidance nahi di ja rahi to koi faida nahi. Scam karna hi agar purpose ban jaye to phir chori karke kamao ya dakaiti se baat ek hi hai.

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoinblog on April 03, 2023, 11:45:39 AMProjects ko Judge karna ek bahut mushkil kaam hai aur youtube Channel se agar proper guidance nahi di ja rahi to koi faida nahi. Scam karna hi agar purpose ban jaye to phir chori karke kamao ya dakaiti se baat ek hi hai. Ye to ek dum sahi baat hai. If you want to know a project better than my advise is to read it's white paper. After reading it if you think it worthy of your investment then go ahead. Still there is no guarantee whether that project will work or ditch you in the future. Blindly never follow any influencers. There are a lot of example of influencers recommending project which later on became a scam.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: i watch coinbureau, guy provide very valuable information by researching in deep,and i don't watch coinbureau to make decisions i watch for information, and decide everything by my own, i don't follow anyone only i watch coin bureau for info,

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 02, 2023, 03:54:51 PMHello,I mostly watch others channel outside from india, is want to know is there any good indian youtube channel to learn about cryptocurrency, there are too many channels but many of them are sharing low quality content, and someone crypto king keyur named channel is really getting worse now a days, i watched his videos 2years ago when i was new to crypto, and now he do too much overacting i get angry on him, don't get serious about that just a thought.please tell if there is a good channel.Well there aren't many Indian Youtubers specifically having a channel for crypto but there are some people who have posted videos on crypto related topics.But if you are looking specifically for an Indian crypto Youtube channel then there's one I got for you.https://www.youtube.com/@cryptovel/videosI have found this from one of my earlier topics on this board way back from 2021.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5305690.0

comments.author: teosanru
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 02, 2023, 03:54:51 PMHello,I mostly watch others channel outside from india, is want to know is there any good indian youtube channel to learn about cryptocurrency, there are too many channels but many of them are sharing low quality content, and someone crypto king keyur named channel is really getting worse now a days, i watched his videos 2years ago when i was new to crypto, and now he do too much overacting i get angry on him, don't get serious about that just a thought.please tell if there is a good channel.See first of all what is you intent to watch a YouTube channel? If you are looking for a channel to learn trading or just casually know about what is going to hit moon soon then unfortunately there is no such single genuine channel, all of them make random guesses which aren't accurate most of the times and also can be pretty dangerous because a few are just pumps and dumps, but if you want to learn about the technology there are plethora of channel, infact most of the channels will teach it to you quite accurately.

comments.author: RajeshKarwa
comments.body: There are several Indian YouTube channels that cover cryptocurrency topics. Here are a few Indian YouTube channels that provide information and insights on cryptocurrencies:1. Coin Crunch India: Coin Crunch India covers various aspects of cryptocurrency, blockchain technology, and related news specific to the Indian market.2. Indian Cryptonator: This channel offers educational content, market analysis, and updates on the cryptocurrency industry, including discussions on Bitcoin, altcoins, and blockchain projects.3. Crypto India: This channel focuses on educating viewers about cryptocurrencies, blockchain technology, and related news from an Indian perspective. They cover topics such as Bitcoin, altcoins, ICOs, and trading strategies.4. Desi Crypto: Desi Crypto aims to educate and provide market analysis, news updates, and interviews with industry experts.Thanks !!
